def.dt: :a person whose job is to help another person to do work a magician's assistant [=helper] an assistant to the college president an assistant to the store manager a dental assistant [=a person whose job is to help a dentist] a wealthy executive who has a personal assistant see also physician's assistant
:a person whose job is to help the customers in a store She works as a sales assistant [=salesclerk] at Macy's. (Brit) a shop assistant
:having the job of helping someone to do work :having a lower rank or position than others in a group, organization, etc. an assistant store manager an assistant editor
:a teacher at a U.S. college or university who has a rank above an instructor and below an associate professor
:a person who provides basic medical care and who usually works with a doctor called also (US) PA (US) physician assistant
:a graduate student who teaches classes at a college or university abbr. TA
